title: Musical forms: the canon (TEFC)
brief_description: Uses animation and live-action photography to illustrate the various elements of a canon. Also explores the variations of this musical form from the classical canon to a contemporary rock canon.
description: Uses animation and live-action photography to illustrate the various elements of a canon. Also explores the variations of this musical form from the classical canon to a contemporary rock canon.
